featured.title: Full Stack Face Recognition App
featured.description: A full-stack React application featuring face recognition capabilities and a robust login system. The app integrates with a secure database and leverages the Clarifai API for advanced image processing and face detection.
features: User authentication system with secure password hashing
Real-time face detection in uploaded images
PostgreSQL database integration for user data management
RESTful API endpoints for seamless frontend-backend communication
Responsive design for optimal viewing across devices
featured.implementation: The application is built with a React frontend that communicates with a Node.js/Express backend. User data is stored securely in a PostgreSQL database with passwords hashed using BCrypt. The face recognition feature utilizes the Clarifai API's machine learning models for accurate detection. JWT tokens are implemented for secure user sessions.

recent.title: Rent Apartment Application
recent.description: This was by project for the OOP course that won the best project competition. Rent Apartment Application simplifies the process of finding and renting apartments for both tenants and landlords. The application provides an intuitive interface for tenants to search available apartments and for landlords to list their properties. Additionally, a machine learning model offers price recommendations for landlords based on various factors.
features: Search Apartments: Easily browse available apartments based on preferences such as location, size, and budget.
View Details: Access detailed information about each apartment, including images, amenities, and contact details.
Request Rental: Express interest in an apartment by submitting a rental request through the application.
List Apartments: Effortlessly list apartments by providing essential details such as location, size, amenities, and desired rent.
Receive Recommendations: Utilize a machine learning model to analyze market trends and receive optimal rental price suggestions.
Manage Rental Requests: View and manage rental requests from interested tenants.
recent.implementation: Machine Learning Model: The application employs a trained machine learning model to assist landlords in determining competitive and fair rental prices for their apartments. The model considers factors like YearBuilt, size, FLoor to provide a simple recommendation.

recent.title: Tic-Tac-Toe AI (Unbeatable with Minimax Algorithm)
recent.description: An advanced Tic-Tac-Toe game featuring an AI opponent that is unbeatable. The AI uses the Minimax algorithm to evaluate moves, ensuring it always plays optimally.
